<added_manually>false</added_manually> <api_markdown>## <a name="script-include-boeingben"></a> Script Include: BoeingBEN
### Class: `BoeingBEN` &nbsp;&nbsp;**BoeingBEN()**
### Constructor &nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**new BoeingBEN()**
### Static Properties #### `BoeingBEN.DEBUG` = true
### Method Details #### `getIDP()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the sys_id of the appropriate IdP definition record.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `string` : sys_id from the saml2_update1_properties table. #### `getUserSessionValue()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Returns the client data property value, where the property name is contained in system property boeing.multisso.session_variable_name, from the current user's session.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from a client data property in current user's session. #### `getUserValue()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Gets a true/false value from the current user's User record field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD).
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Value from the current user's User record. #### `initialize()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Helper functions for handling Boeing multi sso requirements.
#### `ipAddressIsOnBEN()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Returns true/false based on whether the current user's ip address is on BEN or not
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` #### `setUserSessionValue()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false client data property (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_SESSION_VARIABLE) in the current user's session based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.
#### `setUserValue()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Sets a true/false field (defined by this.ON_BEN_USER_FIELD) on the current user's User record based on if the current user's ip address is on BEN.
#### `_getBENCIDRRanges()` &nbsp;&nbsp;Returns an array of BEN ip address ranges
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `Array` : List of ip addresses within BEN. Should be
one of more CIDR ranges. #### `_ip4ToInt(ip)` &nbsp;&nbsp;Converts an ip address to an integer.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | ip | string | IP address.
<p> | &nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `integer` #### `_isIp4InCIDR(cidr)` &nbsp;&nbsp;Determines if the current user's ip address is within the ip range parameter.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | cidr | string | IP address range value in CIDR format.
<p> | &nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** * &nbsp;&nbsp; `boolean` : Based on whether current's user's ip address is within ip address range. #### `_log(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;Adds a message to the system log if BoeingBEN.DEBUG is true.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | msg | String | Message to add to the system log. | #### `_logError(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;Adds an error message to the system log.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | msg | string | Message to add to system log. | #### `_logWarning(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;Adds a warning message to the system log.
&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters**
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | msg | string | Message to add to the system log. | </api_markdown> <html/> <markdown_document display_value="KB0010041 v2.0">80fd7693dbc17300d0cb5385ca96194c</markdown_document> <markdown_link>script-include-boeingben</markdown_link> <order>200</order> <project_code_document_version/> <remote>false</remote> <remote_json/> <remote_source_id/> <show_html>false</show_html> <show_markdown>false</show_markdown> <source_description/> <source_id>749bd5c1db286b008dec3a92ba961912</source_id> <source_key/> <source_name>Script Include: BoeingBEN</source_name> <source_script_field>script</source_script_field> <source_table>sys_script_include</source_table> <source_text/> <source_type>Document</source_type> <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-02 00:10:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1560075bdbc17300d0cb5385ca9619c3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-05-02 00:10:56</sys_updated_on> </x_58056_md_docs_markdown_source> </record_update>
